channel.title: Odat on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Odat on TLDRBins

item.title: Oracle Database
item.description: Tools sqlplus ODAT # Install sudo apt install oracle-instantclient-sqlplus # export LD_LIBRARY_PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib/oracle/19.6/client64/lib${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH} # Check sqlplus -V # Install sudo apt install odat # Check odat --version Ref: Download ODAT Enum # SID enum (You only need one) odat sidguesser -s 10.10.11.10 # User/Password brute force odat passwordguesser -s 10.10.11.10 -d <SID> --accounts-file accounts.txt # Run all checks with creds as sysdba odat all -s 10.10.11.10 -U <USER> -P <PASSWORD> -d <SID> --sysdba General # Export everytime or add to ~/.
